answers.answer: Call your doctor. From what I understand excessive swelling can be an indicator of preclampsia (however you spell it).
Yes you need to contact your doctor cause the only time your face will normally swell is if you develop gestational diabetes. At least thats what the doctor told me. I would call to make sure though.
Call your doctor. From what I understand excessive swelling can be an indicator of preclampsia (however you spell it).
Or the preclamsia which you dont want that either!!!

question: Should I be worried or does this just come with being pregnant?  Lately I've been waking up swollen ( hands face and feet) it hurts so much and it's hard for me to close my hands. Should I contact my doctor or is this normal
title: What to do
